questions.question: What is Greenhouse?
questions.answer: Greenhouse is the Dunamis Movement's school of revival and transformation. It offers an immersive experience focused on leadership development and the activation of the supernatural gifts of the Holy Spirit. The program aims to equip students to influence and impact various spheres of society with the power and radical love of Jesus. Students are encouraged to live out the Great Commission and carry the message of Christ to all nations.

questions.question: What is the date of Greenhouse Europe 2025?
questions.answer: Greenhouse Europe 2025 will take place from July 9th to July 19th, 2025.

questions.question: Where is Greenhouse Europe 2025 held?
questions.answer: The event will be held in Palermo, Italy, at the following address: SS 113 Settentrionale Sicula, 90047 Partinico PA, Italy.

questions.question: Is Dunamis Greenhouse a Summer Camp?
questions.answer: No, Dunamis Greenhouse is not a summer camp. It is a school of revival and transformation focused on leadership development and the activation of the supernatural gifts of the Holy Spirit.

questions.question: How do I join Greenhouse?
questions.answer: To join Greenhouse, you must sign up for the selection process via this link: https://form.respondi.app/hefJH0HK

questions.question: What is the minimum age to participate? Is there an age limit?
questions.answer: Students must be at least 16 years old to participate. For participants aged 16-18, a notarized authorization form signed by their guardians is required at check-in. There is no upper age limit; Greenhouse welcomes participants of all ages.

questions.question: How does the recruitment process work?
questions.answer: After registering, our team will contact you to schedule a 20-30 minute video call. During the call, we’ll get to know you better, and you’ll learn more about the school. The main criteria for approval are: being at least 16 years old, being a Christian, being connected to a local church, and having a genuine desire to participate in the school. After the call, our team will pray and assess whether it’s the right time for you to participate.

questions.question: How will I know the result of my recruitment process?
questions.answer: Within 5 working days of the call, you’ll receive an email with the results of your selection process. If you haven’t received the email, check your inbox and spam folder. If it’s still missing, contact the staff member who initially contacted you.

questions.question: What if I wasn’t approved for this edition?
questions.answer: You can apply again for the next edition of Greenhouse. Approval for one edition does not guarantee approval for future editions.

questions.question: Can I participate in the recruitment process if I’m unsure about attending?
questions.answer: Yes, you can participate in the recruitment process. Approval does not obligate you to attend; your place is only secured once the registration fee is paid.

questions.question: Can I transfer my approval or registration to someone else?
questions.answer: No, approval and registration are personal and non-transferable. Each participant must go through the selection process independently.

questions.question: How much is the registration fee?
questions.answer: The total registration fee is 850€.

questions.question: What is included in the registration fee?
questions.answer: The fee covers: Student kit (teaching materials), food (breakfast, lunch, and dinner), and accommodation from July 9th to July 19th in Palermo, Italy.

questions.question: How do I pay the registration fee?
questions.answer: Payment can be made via Stripe. A payment link will be sent to you in the approval email.

questions.question: Do I have to pay immediately after approval?
questions.answer: No, but we recommend paying as soon as possible to secure your place. Note: Approval does not guarantee a place; registration is confirmed only after payment.

questions.question: What if I need a refund?
questions.answer: Refund requests should be sent to gheurope@idunamis.org. Refunds are processed according to the following terms: Cancellation up to 60 days before the school: Full refund minus transfer fees. Cancellation within 30 days before the school: 60% refund (40% retention covers event preparation costs). Refunds are processed after the course concludes.

questions.question: Can I transfer my registration payment to another participant?
questions.answer: Yes, please contact us at gheurope@idunamis.org.

questions.question: Can married couples attend together?
questions.answer: Yes, married couples can attend, but please note: There are no family dormitories available. Accommodation is separated by gender (male and female dormitories). Couples will not be housed together.

questions.question: Can I bring my baby or children?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, Greenhouse 2025 does not have the facilities or space to accommodate children or babies.

questions.question: What’s the weather like in Palermo during July?
questions.answer: The weather is hot, with temperatures ranging from 23°C to 35°C. Pack comfortable, summer-appropriate clothing suitable for worship and activities.

questions.question: What should I pack?
questions.answer: Required Items: Identity documents or passport, sunblock, face and body towels, personal hygiene items (deodorant, soap, shampoo, toothbrush, etc.), Bible, notebook, writing materials, water bottle, comfortable clothes and sneakers, cash (if possible), and ironed clothes (no iron will be provided). Recommended Items: Universal plug adapter.

questions.question: How much luggage can I bring?
questions.answer: We recommend a medium-sized suitcase and an additional backpack or bag. Pack wisely and avoid unnecessary items.

questions.question: How do I get to Palermo?
questions.answer: The nearest airport is Aeroporto di Palermo (PMO). We will provide a bus service from PMO to the school location on July 9th and back on July 19th. Check-in starts at 2:00 PM on July 9th. Lunch is not provided on the first day; only dinner will be served.

questions.question: Is the bus included in the registration fee?
questions.answer: This information will be confirmed soon.

questions.question: Can I drive to Palermo?
questions.answer: We do not encourage driving, as we cannot guarantee parking availability.

questions.question: What does the daily routine look like?
questions.answer: Mornings: Praise, worship, devotional sessions, and practical training on Christian principles with Dunamis Movement leaders and guests. Afternoons: Classes, workshops, dynamics, training, and fellowship time. Evenings: Revival Nights with Dunamis Movement leaders and guests, allowing freedom for the Holy Spirit to move.

questions.question: What are mission trips?
questions.answer: Mission trips are optional 10-day trips that occur after the school. They provide an opportunity to put into practice what you’ve learned during Greenhouse.

questions.question: Are mission trips compulsory?
questions.answer: No, they are optional but highly recommended.

questions.question: Is the cost of the mission trip included in the school fee?
questions.answer: No, mission trips have separate costs, which vary depending on the destination. These costs cover accommodation, meals, and local transportation but do not include airfare.

questions.question: How do I sign up for a mission trip?
questions.answer: Students will receive a registration link in the WhatsApp group. Registration does not guarantee a place; you’ll need to undergo an interview for approval. Limited spots are available, so choose your destination wisely.

questions.question: Can I bring food?
questions.answer: Yes, you can bring non-perishable snacks. However, the accommodation is not equipped for cooking, so avoid perishable items.

questions.question: Will food be sold at Greenhouse?
questions.answer: Yes, snacks, sweets, savory items, drinks, and personal hygiene items will be available for purchase.

questions.question: Can I pay by card at Greenhouse?
questions.answer: Yes, credit cards, debit cards, and cash are accepted.

questions.question: Can I leave the venue during the school?
questions.answer: No, students are not allowed to leave during the school except in urgent or exceptional situations. Contact the leadership for guidance.

questions.question: Is there Wi-Fi available?
questions.answer: This information will be confirmed soon.

questions.question: Is there a place to wash clothes?
questions.answer: This information will be confirmed soon.

questions.question: Do I need a bed kit?
questions.answer: This information will be confirmed soon.

questions.question: How can I contact the Dunamis Greenhouse team?
questions.answer: For further questions, contact the Dunamis Greenhouse team at gheurope@idunamis.org.
